search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=diskio.read_bytes host=* name=* by metric_name, name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(diskio.*) as "*_counter" by _time, name | streamstats current=f last(*_counter) as "*_prev" by name | eval read_bytes=((read_bytes_counter-read_bytes_prev)/10000000) | fields _time, name, read_bytes | where NOT (read_bytes<0) | timechart useother=f limit=45 minspan=1m bins=1000 avg(read_bytes) as read_bytes by name
